Yes No Please fill empty fields! Logging in as Logging in Sorry, no internet connection available
App successfully uploaded We\'re processing your app! It\'ll be in your store soon. This app is already in your store. (APK-103) You don\'t hold the distribution rights for this app! Contact us for more info. (APK-101) You don\'t hold the distribution rights for this app! Contact us for more info. (APK-112) An infection was detected. Please contact us if you have the distribution rights. (APK-102) The publisher is the only one allowed to update this app. (APK-104) The app signature is not valid. Please contact us if you have the distribution rights. (APK-106) We need more info! Please tap here. Upload failed. Please try again. Upload failed. Unknown error occurred, please try again later. Unknown error occurred. This type of app is not supported... yet. But, it\'ll be supported soon! Oops… Your app seems to be spam. Please contact support@aptoide.com.
You are about to sign out from Uploader, are you sure? App Selected Apps Selected The store name you\'re using already exists. Be creative, dude! (edited) Oops, it seems you\'ve got connection issues. Try again later!
Dark Theme It helps to relieve eye strain when using your device in the dark.
Your email here We\'ll send you a magic link. Send magic link Secure login No passwords saved on our side Check your email! We\'ve sent a magic link to %s to log in. Open email app Your magic link expired! Send a new one to your email. This email isn\'t valid! We\'re working on it! Check our blog Our users\' security is our top one priority, so login to Aptoide Uploader is temporarily unavailable while we work to make some changes on it. We\'ll be quick! We\'re working hard for it to be back soon, so stay tuned! Connect with Facebook Connect with Google
